title: Take control of your data
description: When you use our services, you're trusting us with your information. We understand this is a big responsibility and work hard to protect your information and put you in control.

actions.title: Download your data
actions.description: We will email you a report of the data related to your account.

actions.title: Erase your data
actions.description: We will delete all of your account data. This action cannot be undone.

consentOptions.name: Do not sell my personal information
consentOptions.description: We use your personal information to tailor and deliver ads to you on your devices. You may opt out of this use of your data.
